title: People who slowroll in Hearthstone
body:
Who does this? Own up.

I play poker and slowrolling is considered to be the worst thing you can do. What compels a person to slowroll?

To add a LoL aspect, I believe the same people who type "rekt" and "nope" - stupid stuff said after the fact - would probably be ones to slowroll, but that's pure speculation.

replies.body: When it comes to poker there are many annoying tendencies, don't know much about hearthstone but

I've played poker for years. I'm yet to be slowrolled. I've only ever seen it once on a Youtube video and it turned the entire table against the slowroller. People just don't do it, it's too obnoxious.
